title: Why did riot remove updated store ?!?!
body: just wondering why riot removed the updated store it was so much better than the old one!!

replies.body:
Hey jamieyoo

Glad to hear you like it :) 

Unfortunately after we set it up on OCE we found some bugs with it, and had to go back to the old store while we fix them.  It will be coming back soon!

Cheers
Mindstar
